record.field: SELECT Id, Name, VCLS_Alt_Name__c, ParentId, Supplier_Description__c, Key_Information__c, Supplier_Status__c, Supplier_Category__c, Is_supplier__c, Supplier__c, To_be_Reviewed__c, BillingAddress, ShippingAddress, OwnerId, Project_Assistant__c, Project_Controller__c, Invoice_Administrator__c, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, Website, Phone, Fax, Create_Sharepoint_Folder__c, Sharepoint_Folder__c, ExternalID__c, KimbleOne__InvoicingCurrencyIsoCode__c,CurrencyIsoCode,Communication_Percentage__c, Supplier_Project__c, Area_of_expertise__c, LastModifiedDate, Type, Activity__c, Industry FROM Account
Id IN ( SELECT AccountId FROM Contact WHERE Automated_Migration__c = True )

SELECT Id, Salutation, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName,Title,Description, OwnerId, AccountId, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, MailingAddress, Opt_in_Campaign__c, Unsubscribe_Campaign__c, LinkedIn_Profile__c, Phone, Fax, MobilePhone, Email, AccountWebsite__c, LastModifiedDate, Inactive_Contact__c, Opted_In__c, Unsubscribed_from_Marketing_Comms__c FROM Contact

SELECT Id, Name, StageName, CampaignId, Description, Client_Product_Description__c, Reasons_lost__c, Reasons_Lost_Comments__c, Significant_Opportunity_Notes__c, Probability, AccountId, OwnerId, Technical_Advisor__c, CurrencyIsoCode, Amount, ContractId, Project_start_date__c, Deadline_for_Sending_Proposal__c, CloseDate, Proposal_Type__c, Significant_Opportunity__c FROM Opportunity

SELECT Id, Salutation, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, OwnerId, Activity__c, Address, City, Company, Content_Name__c, Country,PostalCode, Street, CurrencyIsoCode, Email,First_VCLS_Contact_Point__c, Opt_in_Campaign__c, Unsubscribe_Campaign__c, External_Referee__c, Fax, Functional_Focus__c, Inactive_Lead__c, Industry, Contact_us_Message__c, Initial_Product_Interest__c, LastModifiedDate, Title, Seniority__c, Phone, Website, Description, LeadSource, ConvertedDate, State, Status, LinkedIn_Profile__c, Opted_In__c, Rating FROM Lead

SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate, Name, External_Contract_Name__c, AccountId, CompanySignedDate, CompanySignedId, ContractNumber, ContractTerm, Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_Update__c, Contract_URL__c, CurrencyIsoCode, CustomerSignedDate, CustomerSignedId, CustomerSignedTitle, EndDate,Link_to_Parent_Contract__c, OwnerId, Parent_Contract_Name__c, Parent_Contract_Type__c, Replaces_Supersedes__c, Type_of_Contract__c, VCLS_Status__c, OwnerExpirationNotice, StartDate, SpecialTerms, Description, LastApprovedDate FROM Contract

SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate, Name, ParentId, OwnerId, AmountAllOpportunities, AmountWonOpportunities, Attendance_Approved_by__c, BudgetedCost, Business_Unit__c, Conference_Organisation__c, Costs_approved_by__c, CreatedById, CreatedDate, CurrencyIsoCode, Description, EndDate, IsActive, LastModifiedById, LastReferencedDate, LastViewedDate, Name_of_attendee_1__c, Name_of_attendee_2__c, Name_of_presentation_given__c, No_of_meetings_scheduled__c, NumberOfContacts, NumberOfConvertedLeads, NumberOfLeads, NumberOfOpportunities, Number_of_delegates__c, Post_Event_Feedback__c, Purpose_of_attendance__c, Region__c, Registration_Costs__c, Savings_negotiated__c, Sponsorship_costs__c, StartDate, Status, Status__c, SystemModstamp, Total_Cost__c, Travel_cost__c, Type FROM Campaign
